paragraphs.body: Should a video game info-box be created? I think it would help make the articles look more professional. It could list developers, publishers, release dates, etc. And if we make it, should it be used for all games, or only the major console ones? Examples seen here, here and here. --AvatarRokus Ghost (Message me • Read my fanon)   13:41, November 8, 2011 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I think that we Pro-Gamers should start editing some more game pages. I was kinda taking a break from editing to focus on finishing my fanon before the year was over, so I apologize for that. But now that both my fanon and the year are over, I think it's time that we start working on the pages again. Agreed? :) Aang20791  AtWA - EaE 01:31, January 3, 2012 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Since I've been working two jobs now, I regrettably do not have as much free time as I have in the past.  What time I have had to spend on the wiki lately, I have not spent editing game articles.  Therefore, regrettably, I don't feel comfortable remaining as part of the Pro-Gamers.  Maybe when I have more time I can try to return, but for now, I must wish you all the best.  It's good to see the group active again :) --AvatarRokus Ghost (Message me • Read my fanon)   05:32, June 11, 2014 (UTC)
